name: Starwars.io 3D - Conquer the Space in the Strategy Game
name_original: Starwars.io 3D - Conquer the Space in the Strategy Game
description:
A war in the space between the SpaceStations of different Origins(Colors)(Stars) so called StarWars. The war to begin in the space where each Space-Station of a particular origin is fighting/Attacking other Space-Stations with their SpaceShips to win/board their Stations and rule the world of space.

Features - 

• War in space 

• Customizable Space Stations 

• Customizable Space Ships 

• Attacks And Blasts 

• Different Interactive Colours

• Interactive Designs
